description:
Startup Xpress is an engaging online startup course. Do you want to start your own startup, or learn how it's done? Then this course is for you. This is the second part of our full Startup Xpress course. You will get a clear framework and methodology to validate your startup idea for real, with real customers. This is the most efficient way to start a startup and it is used by a lot of startup founders around the world. After this course you will have a clear idea of the viability of your startup, how interesting it is, and if you should pursue it, change it or abandon it.

We strive to provide knowledge in the most concise way : our videos are short and straight to the point, while being full of great content. They are adapted for online learning : our tested methodology is fun and engaging.Â 

That's why, in our course, you will never find videos filmed at conferences labelled as "online courses", or ones where someone just talks to you in front of a camera. We want you to get the best online learning experience. This is the second part of our Startup Xpress flagship course! It allows you to build, test & validate your startup idea with customers. You will get :

5 main course topics and plenty of recent startup examples:

  • 4 Ways to Bring Your Product Vision Into Reality
  • In depth : How to Create a Conversion Machine Landing Page
  • In depth : How to Create Cool Promo Videos
  • Free Marketing Techniques to Generate Leads
  • Introduction to Content Marketing

The next sections of our course are coming, so stay tuned
title: Startup Xpress : How To Test & Validate Your Startup Idea
